name: sfire-framework/sfire-bootstrap
description: Combining sFire packages with sFire skeleton app.

suggest.sfire-framework/sfire-cache: Package for temporarily saving and retrieving data to and from cache using file system, APCu or Redis.
suggest.sfire-framework/sfire-captcha: Package for turing test to tell computers and humans apart made easy with sFire captcha.
suggest.sfire-framework/sfire-dom: Package for working with HTML and XML
suggest.sfire-framework/sfire-encryption: Package for encrypting and decrypting data
suggest.sfire-framework/sfire-filecontrol: Package for working with files, directories and mime types
suggest.sfire-framework/sfire-image: Package for applying filters, cropping, resizing, flipping and determining colors in images
suggest.sfire-framework/sfire-logging: Package for logging data to file system
suggest.sfire-framework/sfire-mail: Package for sending emails allowing you to quickly get started sending mail
suggest.sfire-framework/sfire-otp: Package for creating and verifying One Time Passwords based on Time and HMAC
suggest.sfire-framework/sfire-permissions: Package for ACL which specifies if users/roles or system processes are granted access to resources, as well as what operations are allowed on given resources
